sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {AiOutlineSetting} from 'react-icons/ai' import RoundWrapper from '../../components/util/RoundWrapper' import NotificationDropdown from '../notification/NotificationDropdown' import SettingOption from './SettingOption' import { motion } from "framer-motion" import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import styles from './Header.module.css' import SearchResult from './SearchResult' function Header() { const [showNoti, setShowNoti] = useState(false) const [showSetting, setShowSetting] = useState(false) const [notiLength, setNotiLength] = useState() const {auth, notice} = useSelector(state=>state) useEffect(()=>{ const readNotices = notice.data.filter(noti=>noti.isRead.every(id=>id!=auth.user._id)); setNotiLength(readNotices.length) },[notice]) return (
) } export default Header
